atom3d.datasets.rsr package¶

Submodules¶

atom3d.datasets.rsr.ensemble module¶

Code to ensemble FARFAR2-Puzzles dataset.

atom3d.datasets.rsr.ensemble.get_decoy_name(f)¶

Extract name of specific structural model.

atom3d.datasets.rsr.ensemble.get_target_name(f)¶

Extract string target name from FARFAR2 file.

atom3d.datasets.rsr.ensemble.get_target_number(f)¶

Extract integer target number from FARFAR2 file.

atom3d.datasets.rsr.ensemble.rsr_ensembler(pdb_files)¶

atom3d.datasets.rsr.label module¶

Label structures with deviation.

atom3d.datasets.rsr.prepare module¶

Code for preparing rsr dataset (splitting).

atom3d.datasets.rsr.prepare.split(input_sharded, output_root)¶

Split temporally and shuffle examples.

atom3d.datasets.rsr.prepare_lmdb module¶

atom3d.datasets.rsr.prepare_lmdb.get_target(f)¶

Extract string target name from filepath.

atom3d.datasets.rsr.score module¶

Code for loading rosetta score files.

atom3d.datasets.rsr.score.form_score_filter(score_dir)¶

Filter by decoys present in score file.

atom3d.datasets.rsr.score.get_target_name(f)¶

Extract string target name from FARFAR2 file.

atom3d.datasets.rsr.score.load_scores(score_dir)¶

Create target_name -> (subunit_name -> RMS).
